name: Portal Voibes
description:
Portal Voibes is a 3D Speedrun Platformer focusing on building up momentum. The name certainly did not come from a typo trying to spell "Portal Vibes" *cough cough*

You are tasked with finishing the levels as quickly as possible using your abilities such as running, jumping, wallrunning or - with the help of a powerup - dashing.

This is a First Semester Project from Students at the Technical University Munich:

  • Sebastian Köhnlein
  • Sebastian Neumann
  • Martha Reimann
